summary.span: 以變數傳回順序表示已對應函式或查詢的結果。

span.span: Represents the results of mapped functions or queries with variable return sequences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列 SQL 程式碼範例中，結果圖案會根據輸入 (`shape =1` 或 `shape = 2`) 而不同。In the following SQL code example, the result shape depends on the input (`shape =1` or `shape = 2`). 傳回預測的順序是未定義。The order that the projections are returned is undefined. ## Examples ``` CREATE PROCEDURE VariableResultShapes(@shape int) AS if(@shape = 1) select CustomerID, ContactTitle, CompanyName from customers else if(@shape = 2) select OrderID, ShipName from orders ``` [!code-csharp[DLinqSprox#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/cs/northwind-sprox.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DLinqSprox#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/vb/northwind-sprox.vb#4)]

span.span: The type of the sequence to be returned.

summary.span: 依照指定型別的順序擷取下一個結果。

span.span: Retrieves the next result as a sequence of a specified type.
An enumeration for iterating over the results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可使用類似下列的程式碼來執行此預存程序。You would use code similar to the following to execute this stored procedure. > [!NOTE] > 您必須使用 模式，根據您對預存程序的了解以取得正確型別的列舉值。You must use the pattern to obtain an enumerator of the correct type, based on your knowledge of the stored procedure. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqSprox#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/cs/Program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DLinqSprox#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/vb/Module1.vb#5)]
